data.title: Doon Mackichan
data.meta_description: Doon Mackichan (born Sarah-Doon Mackichan on 7 August 1962) played Louise Marlowe in The Sarah Jane Adventures television story The Nightmare Man. She later voiced Madame Vastra in the Doctor Who: Redacted audio series. The Nightmare Man - Louise Marlowe As Madame Vastra Requiem Ghosts Rescue...
data.text:
Doon Mackichan (born Sarah-Doon Mackichan on 7 August 1962[1]) played Louise Marlowe in The Sarah Jane Adventures television story The Nightmare Man.

She later voiced Madame Vastra in the Doctor Who: Redacted audio series.
